ChangeSet.Change: Update the Patchhelper to patch list of guid, string or something else.
Update the Patchhelper to be able to patch a list of tuples when configured correctly.
Fix issue allowing to query all organizations when no organization id is set in the request context.
Switch open-telemetry from beta-libraries to stable libraries
Add generic parameter to scoped jobs.
Fixes a bug where Update and Delete using Data.ITransactions do not successfully add the commands to the data transaction in MongoRepositoryBase.
